CustomField.description: Record Page - Navigate to a specific record page. Object Page - Navigate to the home page of an object. Named Page - Navigate to a named page, such as Home or Chatter. Nav Item Page - Navigate to a custom tab. External URL - Navigate to an external URL.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Record Page - Navigate to a specific record page. Object Page - Navigate to the home page of an object. Named Page - Navigate to a named page, such as Home or Chatter. Nav Item Page - Navigate to a custom tab. External URL - Navigate to an external URL.
CustomField.label: redirection_Type
